description: A Submission to a Synapse Evaluation is a pointer to a versioned Entity. Submissions are immutable, so we archive a copy of the EntityBundle at the time of submission.
name: Submission

id.description: The unique, immutable Synapse ID of this Submission.

userId.description: The Synapse ID of the user who created this Submission.

attribution.description: Describes the submitter and contributors of a submission.

evaluationId.description: The Synapse ID of the Evaluation this Submission is for.

entityId.description: The Synapse ID of the Entity in this Submission.

entityBundleJSON.description: The Bundled Entity and Annotations JSON at the time of submission.

versionNumber.description: The submitted version number of the Entity.

createdOn.description: The date on which Submission was created.
